name: KIA
mission: KIA exists to inspire movement — physically, emotionally, and socially. It creates vehicles that enable people to explore freely, connect deeply, and live more intentionally. The brand’s mission is to make innovation human, transforming transportation into a canvas for progress and purpose.
toneOfVoice: Human, cinematic, and aspirational — speaks with empathy and quiet confidence. KIA communicates to make people feel seen, not just sold to.
visualGuidelines: Clean geometry, wide compositions, and natural lighting. KIA’s visual language celebrates space, movement, and calm confidence. Copy favors clarity and optimism — emotional but never sentimental.
dosAndDonts:
Do: Lead with emotion and design intelligence.
Do: Celebrate progress, family, and connection.
Don’t: Overpromise luxury or performance bravado.
Don’t: Use humor or quirk that undermines credibility.
emotionalResponse: Reassurance, confidence, and optimism — the feeling of stepping into a future that feels safe, beautiful, and human.
culturalTerritories: Modern mobility, human-centered design, family evolution, and purposeful innovation.
